remarks: A natural transformation is a function from the objects of ` C ` to homomorphisms from ` F ( x ) ` to ` G ( x ) ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
natrcl.1 $e |- N = ( C Nat D ) $.
natixp.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( <. F , G >. N <. K , L >. ) ) $.
natixp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
natixp.j $e |- J = ( Hom ` D ) $.
natixp $p |- ( ph -> A e. X_ x e. B ( ( F ` x ) J ( K ` x ) ) ) $.
